Articles.Content:
KwirkyJ Flailing Industries here with a cute spaceplane for local Kerbin use. With a rather unorthodox catamaran design, it is exquisitely stable between its carrying (or not) of a payload. Has repeatedly ferried three tonnes into 125km orbit and returned. Feedback and comments are encouraged.

CATA3t download

[spoiler = "Image"]

Edited June 26, 2013 by KwirkyJ
update download link

Unorthodox, unconventional, ungainly, and amusingly smooth during manouvers. Very impressive!

I wouldn't have guessed 4 control surfaces would be workable...
